text: Need Riley Evans for Fantastic Furniture campaign. Budget around $4,394, looking for 1 x LinkedIn post, 1 x Lifestyle photography, 3 x TikTok video, 2 x 15-second TikTok, 2 x Pinterest pin. 10 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs October 2025. Usage rights for 12 months. Engagement period: 3 months.
